children.docstring: expected: At 375px width, no horizontal scrollbar appears. All content fits within viewport. result: pass
children.name: 1. No Horizontal Scroll

children.docstring: expected: Tapping the Name or Email field in the contact form does NOT cause iOS auto-zoom. Page stays at same zoom level. result: pass
children.name: 2. Form Input No Auto-Zoom

children.docstring: expected: All buttons (Start Free Trial, Send Message, nav links) have comfortable tap targets - no accidental mis-taps. result: pass
children.name: 3. Buttons Easily Tappable

children.docstring: expected: All text on page is readable at default zoom. No need to pinch-zoom to read anything. result: pass
children.name: 4. Text Readable Without Zoom

children.docstring: expected: "Start Free Trial" button in hero section is visible immediately on page load without any scrolling. result: pass
children.name: 5. Hero CTA Above Fold

children.docstring: expected: After scrolling past the hero section, a sticky bar slides up from the bottom with "Call" and "Book Free Trial" buttons. result: pass
children.name: 6. Sticky Bar Appears on Scroll

children.docstring: expected: Tapping the phone/Call button in sticky bar opens phone dialer with +61491791447. result: pass
children.name: 7. Click-to-Call Works

children.docstring: expected: Tapping "Book Free Trial" in sticky bar smoothly scrolls to the contact form section. result: pass note: User noted form scroll position cou
children.name: 8. Book Free Trial Scrolls to Form

children.docstring: expected: When sticky bar is visible, the floating phone button (bottom-right) moves up so it doesn't overlap the sticky bar. result: pass
children.name: 9. Floating Button Repositions

symbols.docstring: User noted two polish items during testing (not test failures):
symbols.name: Observations (Non-Blocking)
